item.name: shelfHealth
item.description: Health information about a particular Location. This will be one of the following: (0-ok, 1-minor, 2-major, 3-majorandminor,4-critical,5-criticalandminor,6-criticalandmajor,7-criticalandmajorandminor)

item.name: shelfSerialNumber
item.description: Used to read the shelf Serial Number from the Fru.

item.name: smmDeviceID
item.description: Display the contents of the DEVICE ID information. The fields are space separated: Field 1 - Device ID Field 2 - SDR Support Field 3 - Device Revision Field 4 - Device Available Field 5 - Firmware Revision Field 6 - IPMI Version Field 7 - shelf Support Field 8 - Bridge Support Field 9 - IPMB Event Generator Support Field 10 - IPMB Event Receiver Support Field 11 - FRU Inventory Support Field 12 - SEL Support Field 13 - SDR Repository Support Field 14 - Sensor Support Field 15 - Manufacturer ID Field 16 - Product ID Field 17 - Aux Firmware Revision

item.name: smmHealth
item.description: smmHealth information about a particular smmLocation. This will be one of the following: (0-ok, 1-minor, 2-major, 3-majorandminor,4-critical,5-criticalandminor,6-criticalandmajor,7-criticalandmajorandminor)

item.name: smmProductName
item.description: The version of the smm software.

item.name: sysName
item.description: An administratively-assigned name for this managed node. By convention, this is the node's fully-qualified domain name.

item.name: systemHealth
item.description: systemHealth information about a particular systemLocation. This will be one of the following: (0-ok, 1-minor, 2-major, 3-majorandminor,4-critical,5-criticalandminor,6-criticalandmajor,7-criticalandmajorandminor)

discovery_rule.name: mBlade
discovery_rule.description: b1Health information about a particular b1Location. This will be one of the following: (0-ok, 1-minor, 2-major, 3-majorandminor,4-critical,5-criticalandminor,6-criticalandmajor,7-criticalandmajorandminor)

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:shelfHealth.last()}>3 and {Huawei Server HMM Template:shelfHealth.last()}<8
trigger.name: HMMshelfHealth critical

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:shelfHealth.last()}=2 or {Huawei Server HMM Template:shelfHealth.last()}=3
trigger.name: HMMshelfHealth major

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:systemHealth.last()}>3 and {Huawei Server HMM Template:systemHealth.last()}<8
trigger.name: HMMsystemHealth critical

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:systemHealth.last()}=2 or {Huawei Server HMM Template:systemHealth.last()}=3
trigger.name: HMMsystemHealth major

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:smmHealth.last()}>3 and {Huawei Server HMM Template:systemHealth.last()}<8
trigger.name: smmHealth critical

trigger.expression: {Huawei Server HMM Template:smmHealth.last()}=2 or {Huawei Server HMM Template:smmHealth.last()}=3
trigger.name: smmHealth major
